mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_product(pid, pcategory, temperature, capacity, price, onsale) VALUES (#{pid}, #{pcategory}, #{temperature}, #{capacity}, #{price}, #{onsale})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product SET pcategory = #{pcategory}, temperature = #{temperature}, capacity = #{capacity}, price = #{price}, onsale = #{onsale}, updatedate = SYSDATE WHERE pid = #{pid}
